name: Him (EylonMalkevich)
description:
Ahhh! Someone tried to poison your beloved king!

      

      Citizens of Afiah Kingdom, 

      Help me find where is the coward traitor before

      it’ll be too late! he’s hiding somewhere between you.

      Catch him before he will be close enough to me...

      Controls:

      [ space ] - to starting and restart 

      [ mouse ] - for looking where is the bastard

      

      ---------------------------

      Designer: Eylon Malkevich

      Guidance : Dani Bacon, Rutu Modan

      Art & Interaction course

      Bezalel Academy of Art and design, 2023
